episodes.title: Ejaculation
episodes.plot: As Andrew falls under the spell of the randy Hormone Monster, his buddy Nick becomes obsessed with the lack of changes in his own body.

episodes.title: Everybody Bleeds
episodes.plot: A field trip goes from awkward to mortifying as Jessi navigates the demands of coupledom and gets her first period -- inside the Statue of Liberty.

episodes.title: Am I Gay?
episodes.plot: A trailer for a new movie starring The Rock leaves Andrew questioning his sexuality. Jessi and Nick's budding romance turns ugly fast.

episodes.title: Sleepover: A Harrowing Ordeal of Emotional Brutality
episodes.plot: While the boys head to Jay's for a testosterone-fueled sleepover, Jessi throws a party of her own and gets caught up in mean-girl drama.

episodes.title: Girls Are Horny Too
episodes.plot: A steamy novel making the rounds at school inspires Jessi to explore her own sexuality -- and leaves the boys totally confused about what girls want.

episodes.title: Pillow Talk
episodes.plot: Nick drags Andrew into the city to visit an old camp crush, but the day doesn't go as planned. Jay embarks on an emotional journey with his pillow.

episodes.title: Requiem for a Wet Dream
episodes.plot: Andrew struggles to keep the Hormone Monster in check as he works with Missy on a science fair project. Jessi and Matthew have fun at Jay's expense.

episodes.title: The Head Push
episodes.plot: When Leah hosts a party for the high school drama crowd, Nick wrestles with a romantic dilemma, and Andrew and Missy witness a disturbing scene.

episodes.title: I Survived Jessi's Bat Mitzvah
episodes.plot: Family blowups, secret liaisons and an unflattering dress make Jessi's bat mitzvah a night to remember.

episodes.title: The Pornscape
episodes.plot: Andrew tries to drown his sorrows in a sea of porn, only to become hopelessly addicted. Coach Steve becomes a suspect in a murder spree.
